website_summaries.verdict: The Moto G6 is a sublime value, despite its minimal drawbacks.
pros: The Motorola Moto G6 has a near-stock version of Android Oreo, good dual-rear cameras, fast charging and a sleek design
cons: The battery life is not as long as last year's Moto G5 or G5 Plus

customer_reviews.title: Phone died
customer_reviews.text: Moto G6 delivered May 9, 2018, as expected and worked for 74 days. On July 22, 2018, charging ceased to function. Service call to Motorola/Lenovo did not fix it. Can't find Mobiles International LLC./order did say "No Warranty". Motorola doesn't cover phones purchased outside the U.S. and said the company was from the Cayman Islands. BAD EXPERIENCE . . $300 down the evil drain!
customer_reviews.author: Fliz

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: There's no need to buy the Iphone X for over $1000 or even the S9 for $700 plus when you can buy the Motorola G6 for a fraction of the price. The G6 has all the features one could want without emptying your pocket book.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Krause

customer_reviews.title: Phone has great potential
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone on a recommendation from a friend who has one. The screen is bright, and it "feels" like a quality phone. I really have been enjoying it. The only reason no 5 star is that I have had some reception problems, both in the city and outer areas. Could be the new carrier, could be the phone, at this point I am not sure. I have an after market case coming and already put on a tempered glass cover for the front which went on extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have high hopes for this phone, since it's the $200 version of my $800 Moto Z force. But it has all the same features and 4 months later not a single problem. Yeah battery could be better but I have a charger at my house, in my car and at work. Honestly the Moto gestures keep me with Motorola. I use the hand chop thing to activate the flashlight almost every day
customer_reviews.author: tyler duggan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth, wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this international version and gifted to my parents in India. After 4 months it’s stopped working due to battery issue, it’s showing always charging symbol,, no luck with reset,, tried with 2 Motorola service center in India,, they also don’t have clue,, the tried to change processor but it’s not available in India market,, wasted 280$,, i was not able return also since it’s in another country,,, highly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Hameed Aashiq

customer_reviews.title: Not all MotoG6's are the Same
customer_reviews.text: I've had a G6 since it was first released and set up two other friends with identical G6's and I have been a fan of the G6. However, there are some significant differences with this version. The most serious is that where the other three phones updated to Android 9, this one does not and stays at Android 8.0.0. The security patch level date is Jan 1, 2019 where the other three are Oct 1, 2019. Dual Sim is a plus if you have the need. If it updates in the next few days, I will revise this review.
customer_reviews.author: bevhoward

customer_reviews.title: Used to be 5 stars..
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace another G6 that my son drowned in a rainstorm. We couldn't get it to update to the latest build and so he couldn't transfer his data from the same model G6. After no solutions from the helpline, we gave up and upgraded him to a G7. Several of us have had this phone and loved it, I don't know why it suddenly wouldn't update, even thou other G6's would. Thankful for Amazon customer service and easy returns.
customer_reviews.author: EastsideGirl

customer_reviews.title: A lot of value
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the pros expressed by other reviewers and while I can sympathize with the reviewers with shattered cases, I have not experienced anything indicating that the phone is overly fragile and that a decent case and a reasonable amount of care wouldn't overcome (although I've only had it about 2 weeks and didn't use it until I had a good case... I bought the Yiakeng dual layer). In general the phone has many of the features and specs of a premium phone at a bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: FAH

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work with Republic Wireless.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a replacement for my current Moto G6 that has the end of a Square dongle stuck in the headphone jack. We currently use Republic. It will not work with Republic. Evidently, the Software Channel on the phone must be either "retus", "amz", or "fi". THIS phone says "retla". I have ZERO idea how I was supposed to know that from this listing, but the phone won't work. So, now I'm stuck with my phone where I can't ONLY hear it through bluetooth because the phone sound won't work. So, I can't hear my calls or voicemails for another two days while I wait for yet another phone to get here.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jones

customer_reviews.title: A lot of phone for the money
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great! I've been an iPhone user ever since the iPhone 3 came out. I've wanted to try an Android for some time but just couldn't build up the courage until now. This phone is plenty fast enough for me (not a gamer). The display is crisp and very nice. The camera is not as good as the newer iPhones and samsungs, but I'm really impressed with it for the price. I've heard people complaining about the phone speaker, but I think it is much better than my previous iphones. I love the Moto gestures and use the flashlight chop and camera twist all of the time. I would buy again hands down
customer_reviews.author: Grayson Page Gettys

customer_reviews.title: The right phone for the right purpose
customer_reviews.text: For the roll out of a company app, we ordered 35 Motorola G6 smartphones. I have been on Motorola smartphones since the Motorola G5 Plus and knew I had to go for somersetting similar for the company. The antenna's are just awesome.. always have good signal for both mobile and WiFi. Also you will love the Moto gestures built in. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hilhorst

customer_reviews.title: Very decent, though could use improvement
customer_reviews.text: This phone is quite awesome, though sometimes it can be confusing. Pros: -It has movement functions, like twist twice for camera and shake for flashlight. -The fingerprint reader is very good, and it allows you to access the phone easily. -The phone came completely new, with the charger and all, no earbuds though. Cons: -The notification noises are quite confusing, and easy to mix up. -If you had an iOS phone before, it takes a while to get used to. - I like organization, so the downward apps really annoyed me, since it was so full. Overall, the phone is very ok.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Phone didn't work.... And all the instructions were Spanish!!!
customer_reviews.text: It Arrived and I was so excited! Looked at the instructions and they were only in Spanish! Then, the phone didn't work! So... Back it goes... And my search for a cell phone continues...
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Good Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good phone but wouldn't receive phone calls. Had to return
customer_reviews.text: this G6 was supposed to be a replacement for the G4 (2015 model). It could've been the perfect replacement! However one of the recent updates broke the most important feature - phone's ability to receive phone calls. Phone calls received went directly to voicemail until phone was rebooted. It would work great for 3 calls maybe after which, once again calls would start going direct to voicemail! I even did a factory reset a couple of times, but that didn't help. Overall features, the stock Android experience was great. Would've been nice if the phone had NFC also. Has to return the handset.
customer_reviews.author: caribcfi

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I'm liking the phone it's great not to have that extra factory apps installed. Also it's dual SIM and works great, high quality in my opinion and has a great processing speed
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Replacing a Moto G4
customer_reviews.text: First off, I am by no means a smart phone power user. I just enjoy the convenience of the phone and its capabilities. My G4 began acting very strangely (after 2 1/2 years), so I decided to look for a replacement. I had liked the G4, so I checked out other Motos. The G6 seemed like a reasonably priced phone so I decided to go that way. After about two weeks of use, I am well pleased, and would recommend this phone to anyone like me who doesn't need the absolute latest and greatest (for 6 or 7 times the price).
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Cannot recommend - Firmware issues
customer_reviews.text: Cannot recommend. Changing review to one-star. This phone randomly will not ring for incoming calls. Very common problem with new Motorola phones if you search online. I have the exact same problem with my new Moto One. No fix I can find. Seems like a firmware problem. Restart is only a temporary fix. These will be my last Motorola phones.
customer_reviews.author: H. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Speaker Problem..don't buy !!
customer_reviews.text: Such a bad choice ...I bought this mobile phone a while ago for my mother and brought all the way to Nepal. But didn't work after 3 days. It has serious speaker problem (also I checked for review from others). Loudspeaker has to be turned on so as to hear other person speaking during call. I couldn't return it either as I was out of US and won't return for a while .........very terrible !!
customer_reviews.author: Sulakshan

customer_reviews.title: Moto6 Perfect Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am truly impressed with this product. This was a gift from my daughter as I did not want a $600.00 phone. Her iPhone is wonderful but she did admit that the Moto6 is quite nice (she chose the Moto6). Upside: no contract with no hidden fees and affordable. Downside? Battery life could be improved. I have my phone on battery saver when not in use. Otherwise, it's an excellent product. Will update if there is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Pythagoras 10

customer_reviews.title: Not official version
customer_reviews.text: This is not the official version. No screen shot, no English instruction and auto turn to sleep mode if serval hours no phone call come in. Go to Moto G6 by sold in Amazon ,not this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Audio does not work
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase! You cannot hear anything while on phone calls, even the speakerphone often is incredibly faint. I can hear the other caller if I turn speaker on and find a spot where I won't disturb others, but this isn't a viable solution. I am in my 20s with good hearing, so I can only imagine how difficult it would be to listen if you are harder of hearing. I tried resetting the phone, updating it, and searched the internet for solutions. It seems like this is a known issue with this phone model, but I wish I had known that before wasting my money.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Dead in less than 3 Months
customer_reviews.text: Can the service provider kill your phone? This one died (no response no matter what we do) Jan10th 2020. Bought it Oct 2, 2019. Should have read more of the 1 star reviews. Worked well until it died.
customer_reviews.author: R. Soto

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded, finally, from a Moto 2nd gen to this, and I'm thrilled with it. New toys are always fun! I think the battery life may be shorter than I'm used to, but I've only had it a couple days and I've been using it a lot, downloading apps and the like. I'm delighted with everything about this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Pip

customer_reviews.title: No No No
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!!! this phone wasn't unlocked and the company would not return my calls so it had to be sent back. This is one of two that came this way from the same seller. It was in Spanish also
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Girl

customer_reviews.title: This is Samsung Galaxy S little brother.
customer_reviews.text: This is a Samsung Galaxy S 10 but for way cheaper. It plays pubg perfectly. So it runs about everything you word want. The battery I think is weaker which is nothing when it fully charged in an hour last a full work day easily. Heavy use lasts 6 hours on average but can last all day if you not on it 24/7. Also if you need it to have extra battery life you can turn on battery saver mode and save more battery.
customer_reviews.author: dagurr

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: every things good, just dont like two things. no charging/ notification led only head phone speakers, no secondary speakers so sound has lower ring/alarm tone that am accustom to but other wise no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Up Moto G6
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a good product buy and performing satisfactorily. A big upscale from my Moto G4. The only issue is that some of the instructions comes up in what appears to be Spanish. It would be appreciated if it was all English or with English translation.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Barrett

customer_reviews.title: A phone that doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone with great expectations. Everything worked great but the phone part. After a few weeks I couldn’t call out. My wife could never reach me or it automatically forwarded it to answering service. I primarily bought phone to use to stay in touch with my wife and her ailing mother. I tried everything and finally gave up. Went back to my senior aged Samsung and it works great. Stay away from this phone. It can do quite a lot but doesn’t work as a phone. Now I have an expensive piece of junk that’s only three months old.
customer_reviews.author: dnf

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this phone
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from the Moto G4, and this phone is beatiful. Bing a little narrower it fits more confortable in the hand, pocket. It runs very well, and the display is very bright and nice. The battery life is also very good, I get easily a day and a half out of a full charge with moderate use. I use it with 2 sim cards and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: V. Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Narrow 5.7' screen
customer_reviews.text: I like the narrowness of this phone most. It seems like a 5.7' screen would be bulky, but this one isn't. The thing I wish I xould find more of is smart cases to fit. But overall I think this is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Syble Lee

customer_reviews.title: Big but Small
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone with the idea that the screen was bigger (5.7in) than my current Moto G4 (5.5in). Unfortunately with the 18:9 aspect ratio the screen size is more like older 5.2in screens. Longer but much narrower. I was looking for the old style 5.7 screen so I returned this phone for a refund. The phone worked fine just too small for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskadude1948

customer_reviews.title: Front LED, network connection issues.
customer_reviews.text: For the past week the front LED flash has continually been on. No idea how it came on and there's no way to turn it off. Also for the past week the phone will not stay connected to the network. It continually asks to update preferred SIM card even though there's only one inserted. If and when it does connect it, it only stays connected for about 5 minutes. Very frustrating since I can only make emergency calls when it does this. Trying to get in touch with the seller, please help.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Don't come crying cuz you didn't listen
customer_reviews.text: I have had this phone for about 2.5 months and it won't hold a charge for 24 hours...I think I was sold a refurbished phone as new. But that's okay. You can send customers junk-in-the-box here on Amazon as long as it's properly packaged and mailed.
customer_reviews.author: sondra ernst

customer_reviews.title: Not for use in North American
customer_reviews.text: They do not tell you this phone is not for use in North America. I have to clean the catch at least 1x a week or the keyboard is not aligned. I get the wrong letter when I touch the keyboard. Aligning it fixes it, but I never had to align a keyboard all the time to use my cell phone. I am over 60 and I do not text everyday. It's a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone, excellent value for money, I have a lot of time buying this brand I have MOTO G 4 MOTO G 5 and now this and it really does not disappoint me, I hope that the next model increases the bet and improves the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I would expect a little more for my money. I feel it is ridiculous that only flagship phones get the best hardware. The technology has come a long way and we should have access to this tech at a lower price. With that said the phone operates fairly well. It is heavily dependent on your carrier though. Bad network means bad service. Occasionally have to reboot the phone due to some latency issues. Other than that I would recommend this phone if you cannot afford a flagship.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: This phone has a unique battery that is very hard to replace. After samsung its menu interface is a pain and not all androids are the same. Cheap but clunky.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this phone! Great features and plenty of storage. Love, love, love the fingerprint reader feature. So much more convenient than having to enter passwords all the time. Very pleasantly surprised at the number of apps for which I can use this feature.
customer_reviews.author: Pam C.

customer_reviews.title: Weak signal strength
customer_reviews.text: It's been two months now been using this phone but never had proper signal. Not sure what's the issue. I did a security update when I got this phone and the signal was really weak and sometimes no signal. I had to reset to factory settings thinking it will resolve the issue. What you pay is what you get !! This phone is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Sagar

customer_reviews.title: Great G Phone At Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone. Upgrading from a Moto G4. I just want to address the warranty. The seller on Amazon said thirty days when I contacted them, but I just registered mine with Motorola and for what it's worth the phone comes back in warranty until July of 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be high in quality and value, but I am new to Android
customer_reviews.text: Actually changing to the Android system is not easy so I do not yet have the sense of full use. Phone seems fast battery seems to go and go and charge quickly. It will take some time to get everything in order.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 80 year old mom. Shes computer stupid, her words not mine, she only wanted a smartphone to stay current so this was the easiest and cheapest I could find.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Good Phone; Great Price
customer_reviews.text: The Moto G6 has some good specifications: HD display, dual camera, metal and gorilla glass construction, good chipset, decent RAM, decent storage. The camera produces good photos. The overall performance is good. The value is great, especially right now, with the G7 model being released. Although this is an international-version with detail messages in Spanish, all critical messages are in English and following the prompts and dialogs during upgrades is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great phone to have
customer_reviews.text: Liked the first one so much I got a second. Batter life is great and phone is a winner my kids love them and they charge quickly via usb c .. do yourself a favor and get these
customer_reviews.author: D.V.W.

customer_reviews.title: Good Phone
customer_reviews.text: Cam quality - decent I like the Motorola features Battery lasts a little more than a day
customer_reviews.author: Sobralia

customer_reviews.title: No manual in English
customer_reviews.text: I am not at all tech savy so a lot of the features are greek to me. Also the manual is in Spanish so it makes it impossible to learn how to use it except by trial and error. What little I have learned is okay. I like this phone but I wish I had a manual in English.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel N

customer_reviews.title: Great low cost smart phone, works fine..
customer_reviews.text: Perfect phone for pictures, videos etc. Bought this for my mother in-law who is from the Philippines. She can use two sim cards at once. It's a great, low cost smart phone...
customer_reviews.author: JohnInNy

customer_reviews.title: I don not recommend it
customer_reviews.text: this phone looks very good on the outside but it is of poor quality, I have only one month I bought it and the speaker stopped working suddenly, I bought two Motorola cell phones and the two have failed me in less than a month so I recommend do not buy mobiles from the motorcycle line
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No English instructions
customer_reviews.text: This phone was shipped without English instructions. Shipped with a gel case. Excellent phone for the price. 8.0 OS. Updated to January 2019 security patch. SIM 1 micro. SIM 2 ???. Very little "cruft". Some Moto stuff, can tun off. Location services NOT very accurate out of box... had to calibrate several times.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Might be ok but didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why but the 2 phones we got just didn't work good after a couple months compared to the g4 I had before these. I was able to get money back and they were very good to work with to get the refund. I wouldn't buy the g6 again unless it totally was on trial.
customer_reviews.author: V. Byler

customer_reviews.title: Slim, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't seem to pick up signal as well as the g4 play that it replaces. Then again, I don't rate at&t high, at all. It might be the "service". Rings loud, clear calls, barely notice a difference between this and an "AMOLED" screen.
customer_reviews.author: Duke Parden Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone... while it worked
customer_reviews.text: The wi-fi does not longer work after only two months. I cannot even use the phone as a hot spot.
customer_reviews.author: JuanCho

customer_reviews.title: Low quality for packing
customer_reviews.text: I felt sad. It is low quality for packing... I only got a phone, a charger. There is no box and user manual. Really not professional. But the phone is not hard to use. I am not satisfied this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yushuo Jiang

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new phone with more storage capacity, and this filled the bill.
customer_reviews.author: French Fan

customer_reviews.title: Phone is great. This seller is not.
customer_reviews.text: The phone speaker stop working 3 months after buying it. I bought two of them. Apparently there is no warranty. Don't buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: excellent price great phone!
customer_reviews.text: this was a replacement for an old phone and I am very satisfied with it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unable to charge
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks of this cellphone. Size. Promptness of delivery but I’m unable to charge it because it came with a cord for another continent :(
customer_reviews.author: Daya

customer_reviews.title: The G6 XT1925-2 fails the T-Mobile BYOD VoLTE Check
customer_reviews.text: The USA single SIM G6 apparently does VoLTE, but the international dual SIM fails the check on T-M's website. I wish it didn't because it looks like a great phone. I had a G5 that I liked a lot except that T-Mobile is cutting back on normal GSM frequencies and is starting to rely on VoLTE, which the G5 doesn't have.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.text: The phone works great do far. I've bought multiple Moto devices and they have never failed me yet. Solid devices with amazing software.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: I live in the Caribbean and it's compatible with both of my service providers....it works well and it's a very sleek executive looking phone.... I used to love Samsung...but now I'm hooked on my Moto G6. This was a very good purchase I recommend it!!!! 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S Abass

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone.for the price you can't get any better.it even has a headphone jack and it's unlocked.came fast in a secure box.satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Tomczyk

customer_reviews.title: Charger
customer_reviews.text: My charger is not working when i contact Motorola company they said they cannot provide charger replacement after some conversation they agree to send charger but still now i did not get any charger for them very worst customer services
customer_reviews.author: Manivasagam

customer_reviews.title: Use my two sim cards I’m happy. Good
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I’m looking for . I haven’t tried it as yet , I will be back with updates.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my daughter and not only does it not have wifi calling, it lasted only about 6 months. No warranty, so no recourse. Very disappointed. Please don't make the same mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel E. Baker

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: KickAss Phone!! Works as well as the new IphoneX my company provides for work. I actually like this one better..ANDROID!
customer_reviews.author: JpL

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Six months using it and love it. Works excellent in Venezuela Also the battery life is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Jesus T.

customer_reviews.title: Sharp smartphone
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Not sure why people spent so much on iPhones etc. I have always had Android smartphones and I really just like the Moto g models. Everytime I am due for an upgrade I get the newest version and I am never disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: B. Arcand

customer_reviews.title: Good phones
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my kids. They're used for wifi calls/texts only.
customer_reviews.author: Calicojack

customer_reviews.title: The Dual Sim drops calls/No product support from Motorola or Seller  DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: The International G-6 has a history of dropping calls to voice mail. It is a software problem. If you have a US G_6 Motorola will replace it under warranty. But the DUAL Sim International phone BY Motorola they direct you to point of sale. Love the phone when it works (about 4 months) but no support by Moto
customer_reviews.author: James F Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. I also have a Galaxy S8 and I like the Moto G6 better. Fast and plenty of storage with the SD card. Best smart phone I've ever had. I use TMobile and didn't have a single problem with the SIM card or getting it started. I've been using it for about 3 months and haven't had a problem or a regret.
customer_reviews.author: Spectre

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone so far. I've found out it does things I was not even aware of! It was also incredibly easy to set up and stay using right away.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Warranty from Uruguay and USA repairs not covered.
customer_reviews.text: They do not cover any repairs from USA as it is based from Uruguay. Need to return due to this. Otherwise a good product. I have 3 stars because of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Venkat Sane

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: very nice phone! Fast, smooth and the screen is nice. The camera is nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Albiar

customer_reviews.title: Review brought to you by my Moto G6
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone! Best $150 ever spent! It's fast, sleek, and all the kids at work don't even notice it isn't a major brand hehehe. The only thing I recommend is a case, you wouldn't want to chance ruining the pretty edges.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this phone as much as I like my g5 plus
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone for the price. Excellent graphics. Very user friendly
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Phone stopped working after just a few months of use
customer_reviews.author: Caesar

customer_reviews.title: broken, not new, and not unlocked.
customer_reviews.text: the phone had a faulty headphone jack and was in a clear silicone case, which was my first clue that it was a used phone. The picture showed a stylus, and there was a space for it in the box but it wasn't there. my carrier said it is not a new phone, and that it was locked down. I'd rate this less than a star if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Angie T

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Received the phone within a week in as described (new) condition (sealed box and everything). The phone itself is a little disappointing in terms of specs I expected more..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for anyone who hates spending almost a grand on iPhone or other top of the line phone. Love it. Way better than g4.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Forde

customer_reviews.title: Phone was not truly unlocked
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself is great. After the first update, the phone locked again. I was no longer able to use it. I couldn't make or receive calls. I messaged the seller and he never replied. I had to contact Verizon to settle the issue. I would recommend the phone, just not the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Niecynace

customer_reviews.title: Auto Restart during Call or Video Chat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cell phone from Amazon in 10/2019, and has been using carefully since then. The major issue is the auto-restart of the phone during call or video conversation. This is happening pretty frequently these days (05/25/2020).
customer_reviews.author: F. Alam

customer_reviews.title: Not unlocked!! False advertising
customer_reviews.text: They claim this is unlocked and international but the SIM only accepts AT&T SIM cards, I am not able to use Verizon, this has been a very big inconvenience as AT&T signal is very poor in my area and cost more than their competitors
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Wellman

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for a few months.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for less than 3 months. My phone now turns off several times a day and need to be restarted. It is getting more frequent. Already shopping for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: byll

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone have low cost
customer_reviews.text: Moto G6 screen is really nice with 1080P and over 400PPI, together with Turbor charger so its 3000ma battery is not real problem, you can get full charged within 1 hours. It is like one middle end phone but with low price, i like it, thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. So far so good. Hard to rate it at this time.
customer_reviews.author: ckychun

customer_reviews.title: Bad signal reception
customer_reviews.text: Very bad signal reception capacity. Even with wifi calling enabled most calls go to voice mail...
customer_reviews.author: Vish

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really good deal. Just don't care about the warranty. If you buy US version aswell, they will ignore your warranty. For the price, it's the best.
customer_reviews.author: Aarjien

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My family are using in mexico with out of problems
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phone died after 6 weeks!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone to use in Costa Rica. It worked great for a few weeks and then died. I have not been able to get into contact with anyone that will provide support. Beware of this phone and seller!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent smartphone
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my father and it was perfect for him, excellent product, what expect it from motorola.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Perez

customer_reviews.title: great media phone, awful battery life
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my moto e4 plus, but sad to say that although it's beefier, the battery life is incredibly lackluster.
customer_reviews.author: hauget

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: This phone was a gift for my father and he thinks it easy and fast to use
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage phone from garbage seller. Quit working after 6 weeks. Complete trash.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Very upset and aggravated
customer_reviews.text: My dad can't answer phone calls and we can't figure how to fix it and we have tried. The screen wont show a way to slid or touch to answer it. This is very upsetting and we are stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Need a new phone.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had phone too long, I'm starting to have problems with it. It freezes, dials on its own & when I'm watching or playing a game it throws me out. Turns on & off by itself. Will not charge completely.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Reynaldo Chavez Jr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone for non-power user
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. She loves it. Elegant design. Big screen. Operates smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: jason gannon

customer_reviews.title: System UI locks up
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for 4 months. The it started having system UI problems and the screen locks up and won't accept any input. Have had to power cycle the phone to get it working again
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price! Lte works perfectly with At&t. Perfect size. Fast enough, I don't need a supercomputer in my pocket. Perfect for essential use. Battery lasts enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Charger not working
customer_reviews.text: I gotta buy another charger con this one didn't worked!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kary Munguia

product_meta.title: Motorola Moto G6 (32GB, 3GB RAM) Dual SIM 5.7" 4G LTE (GSM Only) Factory Unlocked Smartphone International Model XT1925-2 (Deep Indigo)
product_meta.description: Color:Deep Indigo| Size:32GBenvision the possibilities Meet moto g⁶. With a 5.7" Full HD+ Max Vision display, advanced imaging software, and a long-lasting battery,* it’s impressive any way you look at it. more screen, less bezel With a new edge-to-edge Full HD+ Max Vision display, nothing stands between you and your favorite content. Immerse yourself in games and movies with an ultra-wide 18:9 aspect ratio. And with integrated Dolby Audio preset modes, your favorite content always sounds its best. power play Get through a full day on a single charge with a 3000 mAh battery. When it’s time to power up, don’t slow down. The included turbopower charger gives you hours of battery life in just minutes of charging.* faster streaming, less lag Enjoy your favorite apps, games, and videos without lags and interruptions on a blazing-fast Qualcomm Snapdragon 1.8 GHz octa-core processor. With powerful graphics capabilities and 4G speed, you don’t have to sacrifice video quality for a faster load time. sleek and sturdy moto g⁶ is completely wrapped in scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla Glass with a 3D contoured back for a comfortable grip. make a splash A p2i water-repellent coating helps protect the phone from accidental splashes or light rain.
feature_bullets: 32 GB, 3 GB RAM - microSD, up to 256 GB - 12 MP & 5 MP dual rear cameras, f/1.8 aperture - USB - C, 3.5 mm headphone jack
5.7 inches Full HD+, 1080p IPS Corning Gorilla Glass 3 - Non-removable Li-Ion 3000 mAh battery
Android 8.0, Oreo - Keep it moving with a 1.8 GHz octa-core processor and 4G speed.

International model phone, will not have US warranty. Factory Unlocked cellphones are compatible with most of the GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint.
